description: Commands to manage container registry information.

commands.name: az containerapp registry list
commands.summary: List container registries configured in a container app.
examples: az containerapp registry list -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az containerapp registry remove
examples: az containerapp registry remove -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --server MyContainerappRegistry.azurecr.io

commands.name: az containerapp registry set
commands.summary: Add or update a container registry's details.
examples:
az containerapp registry set -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup \
    --server MyExistingContainerappRegistry.azurecr.io --username MyRegistryUsername --password MyRegistryPassword

commands.name: az containerapp registry set
commands.summary: Add or update a container registry's details.
examples:
az containerapp registry set -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup \
    --server MyExistingContainerappRegistry.azurecr.io --username MyRegistryUsername --password MyRegistryPassword

az containerapp registry set -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup \
    --server MyExistingContainerappRegistry.azurecr.io --identity system-environment

commands.name: az containerapp registry show
commands.summary: Show details of a container registry.
examples: az containerapp registry show -n my-containerapp -g MyResourceGroup --server MyContainerappRegistry.azurecr.io
